appDescription.message: Mission Control for your Chrome tabs. Instantly search and switch between visual tab previews.
appDescription.description: A short description of the extension.

pageTitle.description: The title of the extension's main HTML page.

searchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the search input field.

showAllWindowsLabel.description: Label for the 'Show all windows' checkbox.

changeShortcutTitle.description: Tooltip for the button that opens shortcut settings.

resetWindowTitle.description: Tooltip for the button that resets the window size and position.

toggleWithShortcut.description: Tooltip/ARIA label for the shortcut hint; includes the active shortcut.
